name: Don't Crash (itch) (matzieq)
description:
You are Zantarr Stargleam, the greatest rocket pilot in the galaxy. The evil robot warlord Xmivgar imprisoned you in the crystal caves of the ice planet Ksantarus, and now you must rely on your expert piloting skills to escape!

This is a thrust/lunar lander mashup, based on Unity tutorial by gamedev.tv

The game is still in prototype stage, i.e. new levels and possibly new features are coming. 

To play, use arrow keys or A/D and space.
